Articles.Content:
Now, when you say emotes, do you mean KSP emotes? XD If not, Jebediah is safe.

The emotes seem to correspond with the game you turn the cards in from, so yes. At least, that's how getting :Markarth: from Skyrim makes it look

Yeah, there will be KSP related emotes. Found a site that shows all the badges and backgrounds etc etc on it, so you can check there when they get put up.

www.steamcardexchange.net/index.php?showcase-filter-recadded
I wasn't even aware that steam trading cards were a thing. How are they obtained, and what do they do for you?

I wasn't even aware that steam trading cards were a thing. How are they obtained, and what do they do for you?

They got here recently, they're just trading cards. But you can craft them into badges and get XP (useless?) and some bonuses.
Oh. Hrm. I think I'd keep mine. Jebediah card is a must, and you have to have the Bill and Bob combo.
Also, how the heck did nobody compliment this? That car needs to be fixed, though. It's not Kerbal enough. And I don't see a single strut anywhere.
so i got an extra Bill and still need bob, jeb, ground crew, kerbal mechanic and kerbal recruit. if anyone is interested in a trade

This is the Jeb card:

Awesome

*noob question incoming*

Ok.

I missed something.(I don't have steam)

Do you get randomly KSP trading cards in steam?(I guess so, there's a link to steam's KSP trading cards)

Playing the game after the trading cards released will periodically net you a new card. You don't get grandfathered in based on past playing time. You can only gain half of them through drops, the rest you can trade for (hence the name). Then you can make your fancy badge and get cool stuff.
Just when I thought I wouldn't play the game until 0.21.

Trading cards with Kerbals. Cute. Heh

I got Bill Kerman, Ground Crew/marshaller and Gene Kerman/mission control guy while flying around Kerbin with a plane.
Recently transfered to steam. Mocked around on clean install, got a Bob Kerman foil card.
I had no idea about these. When did these come out?

I had no idea about these. When did these come out?

About 4 hours ago so you haven't missed out much.

They just started the trading card system this past week, I think at the start of the Sale.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Sweet. Crafting them also grants items related to the game.

I got myself a planet Kerbin steam profile background and Kerbal emoticon.
I have ground crew and bill so far, gotta catch-em-all!
Steam trading cards for the game at long last! I have to get them all!
How do you level up in steam? I can't figure put how :/

all this talk about how awesome the cards are but none about actually trading them ill get the ball rolling, anyone willing to trade a jeb card for a bill card? steam: trollmylove

edit: maybe it would be a good idea to start a thread specifically for trading the cards

Edited July 14, 2013 by thepielord
i don't get it. I thought there wouldn't ever be special Steam features?
Steam did this, not KSP. It's a Steam-only Metagame that doesn't actually add anything to KSP... or much to Steam, really. But it is a way to kill time.

You though correctly. This isn't a special steam exclusive feature for the game. This is a steam event. I doubt Squad had to do anything at all to make the cards (they are really simple) The work for steam events is generally done entirely by steam. All they had to do to opt in was let the game go on sale

First card was ol' Jeb for me. Is that good? (edit: ok now make that two Jebediah Kerman Cards. If someone wants to trade me for it I currently have two Jeb's and two Kerbal Recruit cards so one extra of each.

Edited July 14, 2013 by esinohio
